biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Trần Nữ Yên Khê (born 1968) is a Vietnamese actress married to director Tran Anh Hung. She has been in all his films thus far, with the exception of Norwegian Wood. She has alleged that, "French people only offer me stereotypical roles of Asian women men fantasize about." 

Description above from the Wikipedia article Trần Nữ Yên Khê licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Trần Nữ Yên Khê
